attributes.action: Stop Govia Thameslink Rail from amending the ticketing facilities at stations
attributes.background: Govia Thameslink Rail have proposed to close and reduce the hours ticket offices will be open and services offered on their stations. Instead offering "Station Hosts" during the periods no formal ticket office facilities are available. Making people have to use station machines and online purchases

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Govia Thameslink Railway, not the Government or Parliament.
